Sequence Information.Peptide Name: ChBac5 (Pro-rich; PrAMPs; Arg-rich, natural AMPs; Goat cathelicidin, ruminant, mammals; animals; BBL)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: It consists almost exclusively of X-P-P-X repeats.Activity:  Active against E. coli ML-35p (MIC < 2.5 ug/ml), L. monocytogenes EGDP (MIC < 2.5 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa (MIC < 2 ug/ml), S. typhimurium, C. albicans (MIC 1.5-3 ug/ml).Antimicrobial robustness: NaCl-insensitive:P. aeruginosa (100 mM); NaCl-insensitive:S. typhimurium (100 mM), NaCl-sensitive:C. albicans (100 mM), and NaCl-sensitive:S. aureus (100 mM).
Literature Information.Author: Shamova O, Brogden KA, Zhao C, Nguyen T, Kokryakov VN, Lehrer RI.1999
Literature Information.Title: Purification and properties of proline-rich antimicrobial peptides from sheep and goat leukocytes.
